name: Mahjongg Investigations: Under Suspicion
description: Organized crime is taking over Metro City. As a detective in the 83rd precinct you must use your Mahjongg skills to unearth clues and bring the criminals to justice. Don Diamante, the city's undisputed godfather, must be located and brought in. Collect and match evidence tiles to pinpoint perpetrators.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS:  Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/Vista Processor:  Intel Pentium III 800 MHz or faster Graphics:  32 MB video card  Memory:  256 MB RAM Hard Drive:  100 MB free hard disk space
